go_data.justification: Transforming growth factor-beta (TGFbeta) regulates cellular differentiation and proliferation during development.
TGFbeta is secreted as a large latent TGFbeta complex containing mature TGFbeta, latency associated peptide, and latent TGFbeta-binding protein (LTBP)-1.
Mature TGFbeta protein was required at the onset of the endothelial-mesenchymal transformation to initiate endocardial cushion tissue formation.
Transforming growth factor-beta (TGFbeta) is a dimeric peptide growth factor.
